Package it.polimi.se2018.list_event.event_received_by_server.event_for_game.event_controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControllerEndTurn
    Extends EventController, the controller receives the command to end the turn from the player
    ControllerInfoEffect
    Extends EventController, the controller receives the selected window's coordinates
    ControllerMoveDrawAndPlaceDie
    Extends EventController, the controller receives the command for the normal move
    ControllerMoveUseToolCard
    Extends EventController, the controller receives the command for the tool card move
    ControllerSelectCellOfWindow
    Extends EventController, the controller receives the selected window's coordinates
    ControllerSelectDiceFromDraftPool
    Extends EventController, the controller receives the selected die's index from the draft pool
    ControllerSelectInitialWindowPatternCard
    Extends EventController, the controller receives the selected window's index of the initial windows
    ControllerSelectToolCard
    Extends EventController, the controller receives the selected tool card's index that the player want to use.
